con:config.script:
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def csvFilePath = "/Users/eddieboyinipalli/Desktop/100UsersTokens.xls" context.fileReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(csvFilePath))
rowsData = context.fileReader.readLines() int rowsize = rowsData.size() for(int i =0; i < 100; i++) {
rowdata = rowsData[i] String[] data = rowdata.split(",") // NB groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("createNB", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
//exp1 passing tokens groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("createExpUnderNB-1", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-11", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-11", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-12", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-12", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-13", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-13", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addCDDElementInExp-11", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchCDDElementInExp-11", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addCDDElementInExp-12", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchCDDElementInExp-12", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
//exp2-passing tokens groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("createExpUnderNB-2", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-21", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-21", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-22", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-22", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-23", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-23", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addCDDElementInExp-21", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchCDDElementInExp-21", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addCDDElementInExp-22", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchCDDElementInExp-22", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
//exp3-passing tokens groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("createExpUnderNB-3", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-31", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-31", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-32", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-32", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addTextElementInExp-33", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchTextElementInExp-33", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addCDDElementInExp-31", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchCDDElementInExp-32", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("addCDDElementInExp-32", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"','')) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("patchCDDElementInExp-32", "X-Authentication-Info", data[1].replaceAll('"',''))
//data creation run testRunner.runTestStepByName("createNB") sleep(300) //exp1 testRunner.runTestStepByName("createExpUnderNB-1") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("addTextElementInExp-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetTextEid-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferTextEidToGet-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("getMainTextLink-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetTextEditDataLink-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferDataLinkForTextPatch-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("patchTextElementInExp-11") sleep(300)
testRunner.runTestStepByName("addTextElementInExp-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetTextEid-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferTextEidToGet-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("getMainTextLink-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetTextEditDataLink-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferDataLinkForTextPatch-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("patchTextElementInExp-12") sleep(300)

testRunner.runTestStepByName("addCDDElementInExp-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetCDDEid-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferCDDEidForGet-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("getMainCDDLink-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetCDDEditDataLink-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferDataLinkForCDDPatch-11") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("patchCDDElementInExp-11") sleep(300)
testRunner.runTestStepByName("addCDDElementInExp-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetCDDEid-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferCDDEidForGet-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("getMainCDDLink-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetCDDEditDataLink-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferDataLinkForCDDPatch-12") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("patchCDDElementInExp-12") sleep(300)
//exp 2 testRunner.runTestStepByName("createExpUnderNB-2") sleep(300)
testRunner.runTestStepByName("addTextElementInExp-21") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetTextEid-21") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferTextEidToGet-21") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("getMainTextLink-21") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("GetTextEditDataLink-21") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("TransferDataLinkForTextPatch-21") sleep(300) testRunner.runTestStepByName("patchTextElementInExp-21") sleep(300)
